Title: Iron in the Fire
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Patrick Harbinson
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Nazanin Boniadi, Laila Robins
Plot: Carrie gets a tip from Redmond regarding Quinn's lead. Saul calls in a favor with an old friend in the Pakistani military. Fara uncovers a deep-rooted conspiracy.
